meanings.definition: The action or process of animating or giving life to something.
meanings.sent1: The interanimation of the puppet show delighted the children.
meanings.sent2: The interanimation of the characters in the movie made it exciting to watch.
meanings.sent3: The interanimation of the toys seemed to make them come alive in the child's imagination.
meanings.sent4: The interanimation of colors in the painting created a vibrant and lively scene.
meanings.sent5: The interanimation of the music and dance performance was truly captivating.

meanings.definition: The state of being animated or brought to life by interaction with others.
meanings.sent1: The interanimation among the friends at the party was contagious.
meanings.sent2: The interanimation of the crowd at the concert added to the excitement.
meanings.sent3: The interanimation between the characters in the story made it more engaging.
meanings.sent4: The interanimation of ideas in the brainstorming session sparked creativity.
meanings.sent5: The interanimation of the team members led to a successful project completion.
